```{r load_package}
library(tidyverse)
```

First read in all file names into a dataframe

```{r filename}
longidata = tibble(
  file_name = list.files(path = "./data")
)
```

Creat a function to read in each participant's data

```{r}
read_data = function(path){
  
  read_csv(file = path)
  
}
```

Change the current working directory to read in the data of each participant

```{r}
#longidata$file_name = paste('"./data/', longidata$file_name, '"')
#setwd("./data") %>% 
#read_csv(file = "con_01.csv")

longidata$data = map(longidata$file_name, read_csv)
unnest(longidata)
```
